attributes.action: examine Prisoner-rights that are better than ours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that as a normal individual that prisoners are given more rights than I.
They do not have to worry about bills nor food nor responsilility for their actions.
I believe that they should be chained to a wall in prison and have to work for food, basic welfare and privileges, as the rest of law abiding people do.
We the people (sorry to be too American) should have the right to be defended and the people should punish those who infringe OUR human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
